post:
Happy new year, to our Chinese Friends

Here at Nexus Bytes, we do things differently. You are not just a customer or another line in our CRM database. You are part of the Nexus Bytes family and we only want the best for our family. We are not going to sell our family members what we won’t buy for ourselves. That’s the Nexus Bytes difference.

We would like to celebrate the Chinese Lunar New Year with our Very own Hong Bao Sales Event!

On top of our existing New Year Q1 Special, we want to offer a limited-time Special to celebrate the year of the RAT!

If you are either an existing family member or a new one, we are offering a solid 18% Crack Back deal :). This is a 48 hours special. Promo expires Sunday 11:59 PM (EST)

Please note, for new signups, this offer is not combinable with Contract buyout or Switcher Specials.

How to Redeem :

Hong Bao Promo Details

For new family members:

  • Signup for any plan with annual billing term.
  • During the ordering process, under additional comment, please leave the following note: “HongBao”.
  • 18% Credit of your net payment will be applied to your account, within 24 hours of your service activation.

For Existing Family Members:

  • Log into your account
  • Add credit from the link shown in your dashboard
  • Add a minimum $28 credit to your account.
  • We will apply 18% bonus upon successful payment 
"Configurable AMD Ryzen Powered VPS : From $2.40/mo"
